channel.title: Posts on Thousands of words
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Thousands of words

item.title: The Story of the Moon
item.description: Roger. Clock. (Neil A. Armstrong) Roger. We got a roll program. (Neil A. Armstrong) Roger. Roll. (Michael Collins) Roll’s complete and the pitch is programed. (Neil A. Armstrong) … Apollo 11 at 1500 feet. (Neil A. Armstrong) Hornet. Roger. Copy. Out. (USS Hornet) Swim 1. Have a visual dead ahead about a mile? (SWIM 1) Hornet. Roger. (USS Hornet) Roger. This is SWIM 1, Apollo 11. (SWIM 1) 300 feet.
